label: additionalInformationNote
comment: A note providing additional information for this supply chain trade line item.
An additional information note for this production process.

rangeIncludes.comment: A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.

domainIncludes.comment: A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
A collection of information specific to an item being used or reported on for supply chain trade purposes.
